name: nested-file-toolkit
description: VS Code extension that makes working with nested files just a little easier than before.

commands.title: Nested File Toolkit: Create Nested File
Nested File Toolkit: Split with Related

nested-file-toolkit.templates.description:
Map of file suffix -> template content.
Key is the same same as file nesting templates.
Templates support the following placeholders:
{{name}} - basename without extension
{{fileName}} - full filename with extension
{{capture}} - captured value from wildcard pattern
{{nestedFileName}} - filename of the nested file
{{nestedName}} - nested file name without extension
{{date}} - date when file is created

nested-file-toolkit.enableParentRefs.description: Enable or disable the parent reference feature that highlights references to parent files when prefixing with `~`.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
